title: Fabrication of magnetic carbohydrate-modified iron oxide nanoparticles (Fe3O4/pectin) decorated with bimetallic Co/Cu-MOF as an effective and recoverable catalyst for the Biginelli reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24175-24184
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03182B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Majid Grami, Zahra Rafiee
A novel magnetic nanocomposite [Fe3O4/pectin/(Co/Cu)MOF] was synthesized and applied as a catalyst for the construction of dihydropyrimidone derivatives with high yields under solvent-free conditions in a short time.
